author: juanpablo
msg: Maven 3 branch for JSPWiki. Main differences with trunk
- placeholder for project's parent-pom (JSPWIKI-771) + a bootstrap build.xml
to avoid IC job failures (related to JSPWIKI-773)
- multimodule directory structure (currently ol' good jspwiki + IT module).
+ Note that, without a real parent pom, this basically means several folders
related to each other, with different functionalities (as opposed to have
everything in a single project folder). Other modules should arise (i.e.:
jspwiki-api, jspwiki-i18n, jspwiki-plugins and so on)
+ would be a nice hop-in for JSPWIKI-768
- selenium tests execution (JSPWIKI-770) (proof of concept, can-and-should be refactored)

author: lbernardo
msg: FOP-2221: Make overflow messages easier to read and fix wrong/ missing messages; applied second patch by Simon Steiner.
